military_scenarios.name: Border Incursion

inputs.video: Unidentified vehicles crossing disputed border area
inputs.text: Reports of increased military activity in the region

military_scenarios.challenge: Assess threat level and determine appropriate response

military_scenarios.name: Hostage Rescue Operation

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of compound with suspected hostages

military_scenarios.challenge: Plan and execute a time-sensitive rescue operation

military_scenarios.name: Cyber Attack on Military Infrastructure

inputs.text: Cybersecurity system alerts detailing attack vectors

military_scenarios.challenge: Mitigate attack impact and identify perpetrators

military_scenarios.name: Humanitarian Aid Mission in Conflict Zone

inputs.video: Drone footage of destroyed infrastructure and displaced civilians
inputs.audio: Radio chatter indicating armed groups in the area
inputs.text: UN reports on urgent medical and food supply needs

military_scenarios.challenge: Coordinate aid delivery while ensuring personnel safety

military_scenarios.name: Submarine Detection in Territorial Waters

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of increased naval activity
inputs.text: Intercepted encrypted communications from the area

military_scenarios.challenge: Confirm threat and formulate diplomatic/military response

military_scenarios.name: Chemical Weapon Threat in Urban Area

inputs.video: CCTV footage of suspicious activity around chemical plant
inputs.text: Environmental sensor data showing trace amounts of toxic substances

military_scenarios.challenge: Identify threat, plan evacuation, and neutralize chemical hazard

military_scenarios.name: Peacekeeping Mission in Civil War Zone

inputs.video: Aerial surveillance of clashes between armed factions
inputs.text: Social media analysis revealing growing tensions

military_scenarios.challenge: De-escalate conflict and protect civilian population

military_scenarios.name: Space Debris Collision Threat

inputs.video: Telescope footage of approaching space debris
inputs.audio: Space station crew reports of visual confirmation
inputs.text: Radar data showing collision course with military satellites

military_scenarios.challenge: Prevent collision and minimize impact on global communications

military_scenarios.name: Covert Extraction of High-Value Asset

inputs.video: Thermal imaging of guard patterns around secure compound
inputs.audio: Voice recognition analysis of intercepted calls
inputs.text: Geopolitical reports suggesting narrow extraction window

military_scenarios.challenge: Plan and execute extraction while maintaining plausible deniability

military_scenarios.name: Natural Disaster Response

inputs.video: Satellite imagery of at-risk population centers
inputs.audio: Seismic data indicating imminent volcanic eruption
inputs.text: Weather forecasts predicting conditions hampering evacuation

military_scenarios.challenge: Coordinate large-scale evacuation and disaster relief efforts
